about_the_game:
Star Child is an explosive new futuristic action-adventure game built by a small and passionate indie team.

Explore a mysterious alien world full of unique environments, populated by dangerous alien foes.



Conquer a variety of bosses, each one designed to have a unique visual and gameplay style.

Discover secret areas, find new weapons, enhance your abilities, and destroy any obstacles in your way!

Feeling a bit overwhelmed by it all? Relax for a moment and catch some fish!

  • Colorful, hand-crafted pixel art
  • Powerful original soundtrack composed by Tantrum Tech
  • Multiple difficulties designed for a wide range of ages and skill levels
  • Full keyboard and controller support

name: Star Child

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200, AMD Athlon XE BE-2300 (x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, or any x86_64 CPU)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500 (Broadwell), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri), Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support

short_description: Star Child is an explosive new action-adventure set on a sinister alien planet. Fight numerous aliens and formidable bosses, wield powerful explosives and destructive laser weapons, find secrets and unlock new abilities as you progress. Can you survive your dangerous mission?
